briefTitle: Incorporating Robotic Surgery in Both Mastectomy and DIEP Flap Reconstruction
officialTitle: Oncoplastic Entirely Robot-Assisted Approach (OPERA) - Incorporating Robotic Surgery in Both Mastectomy and DIEP Flap Reconstruction
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients with unilateral breast cancer received robotic-assisted mastectomy and robotic assisted free DIEP flap harvest for breast reconstruction

Exclusion Criteria:

* None
